backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access‑controlled user profiles, posts, and chunked media upload with various state maps and helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based OKLCH color theme and base styles including dark mode variables and element resets.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root mount element, favicon, metadata, and script loader for main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling auth flow, profile setup, navigation among landing, feed, viewer, and upload composer, plus footer links.
frontend/src/components/feed/Feed.tsx: Displays a paginated grid of posts with loading, error, and empty states, and controls for navigating pages.
frontend/src/components/feed/PostCard.ts: Renders a clickable media preview for a post, detecting video formats and generating an object URL.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with left-aligned logo, greeting text, and right-aligned auth and upload controls.
frontend/src/components/Landing.tsx: Unauthenticated landing page with hero video, orange calligraphy LookyLoo title, subtitle, and three info cards.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their display name.
frontend/src/components/upload/UploadBut: Simple button component that triggers a file upload action.
frontend/src/components/upload/UploadCom: Provides a UI for selecting a file and uploading it in chunks with progress, cancel, and success handling.
frontend/src/components/viewer/PostViewe: Displays a full post with media, share and delete actions, handling loading and authorization states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useChunkedUpload.ts: Handles chunked file uploads with progress, retries, cancellation, and backend finalization.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, including login, logout, and identity loading logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and posts through the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables and global styles including light/dark palettes and custom fonts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/utils/chunking.ts: Utility functions for slicing files into 512KB chunks and computing chunk ranges/counts.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters with hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and theme variables.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, requirements, and architecture for the media-sharing app.
